name: Pearson Labs
long_description: Pearson builds AI agents to help law firms and companies execute corporate transactions. We help rainmakers at law firms run gigantic books of businesses with AI. Companies pay for the software to reduce billable hours. Within a month, we have our first design partner, Orrick, a $1b+ revenue law firm, whoâ€™s working with us closely to build an AI data room for their 5000 clients.
one_liner: AI agents to help law firms execute corporate transactions
